# Welcome to Manuel Rausch's website!

I am currently substituting as Professor for General Psychology at the [Catholic University of Eichst√§tt-Ingolstadt](https://www.ku.de/ppf/psychologie/psychologie6). Otherwise, I am 
a research associate in Psychology and Cognitive Neuroscience based at [Rhine-Waal University of Applied Sciences, Faculty of Society and Economics](https://www.hochschule-rhein-waal.de/en/faculties/society-and-economics). My research interests include

-   Metacognition
-   Cognitive modeling
-   Mathematical modeling of behaviour
-   Perceptual decision making
-   Confidence in perceptual decision making
-   Visual awareness
-   Meta-Psychology

I signed the [commitment to research transparency and open science](http://www.researchtransparency.org).
